content: **gauge ** - 12sts and 10 row = 4 over pattern stitch using mc and size h/8 5mm hook - 10st and 8 row = 4 over single_crochet using a and size k/10 5 7mm hook **from the description ** crocheted in one piece this wooly wonder will keep your little lamb warm all night long the sheep are crocheted separately and sewn on adding depth and dimension to this eye-catching blanket **materials ** approximately 1658yds of worsted weight yarn **colors ** lime white black worsted weight yarn in white and black for embroidery
